item.title: 维旺迪为 Canal+ 股票选择伦敦证券交易所，为 Havas 分拆选择阿姆斯特丹证券交易所
item.description: 随着法国亿万富翁文森特-博洛雷（Vincent Bolloré）推进其庞大的媒体和娱乐帝国的分拆计划，维旺迪公司（Vivendi SE）表示，其 Canal+ 广播业务应在伦敦证券交易所上市，哈瓦斯（Havas）广告公司可能在阿姆斯特丹交易。【原文：Vivendi SE said that its Canal+ broadcasting business should be listed on the London Stock Exchange and that the Havas advertising agency is likely to trade in Amsterdam as French billionaire Vincent Bolloré moves ahead with plans to break up his sprawling media and entertainment empire.】

item.title: 自由港液化天然气重启，欧洲天然气跌至一周来最低点
item.description: 随着得克萨斯州自由港液化天然气工厂部分重启，供应风险减弱，欧洲天然气价格跌至一周以来的最低水平。【原文：European natural gas prices declined to the lowest level in a week as supply risks abated with the partial restart of the Freeport LNG plant in Texas.】

item.title: 乌克兰与债券持有人委员会达成债务重组协议
item.description: 乌克兰与一些私人债权人原则上达成了一项协议，重组 200 多亿美元的国际债务，此举可使这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家避免违约，并节省资金来资助与俄罗斯的战争。【原文：Ukraine reached an agreement in principle with some of its private creditors to restructure more than $20 billion of international debt, in a move that could allow the war-torn country to avoid default and save money to finance its fighting against Russia.】

item.title: Amplats 称约 2800 名员工因重组离职
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的铂金业务完成了对南非业务的重组，迄今已有约 2800 名工人离职。【原文：Anglo American Plc’s platinum business completed a restructuring at its South African operations that’s so far resulted in the departure of about 2,800 workers.】

item.title: 中国购买石油为亚洲现货市场带来些许缓解
item.description: 中国炼油商在中东地区购买石油有助于支撑亚洲原油现货市场，尽管人们对中国的需求轨迹仍存在根深蒂固的担忧。【原文：Oil-buying by Chinese refiners in the Middle East is helping to support the Asian physical crude market, even as deep-seated concerns remain about the trajectory of the nation’s demand.】

item.title: 中国黄金进口因价格高企而减少近三分之二
item.description: 中国上个月的黄金进口量大幅下降，这表明在经济不景气的情况下，贵金属价格上涨令中国买家望而却步。【原文：China’s gold imports plunged last month, a sign that the nation’s buyers are deterred by the precious metal’s elevated prices amid a sluggish economy.】

item.title: 肯尼亚骚乱导致先令创一月以来最长跌势
item.description: 过去一个月的反政府骚乱扰乱了肯尼亚的经济，并使投资者感到恐慌，这正在伤害肯尼亚的货币，使其遭受了自一月份以来最长的一次下跌。【原文：Anti-government riots that disrupted Kenya’s economy for the past month and spooked investors are hurting its currency, which has suffered its longest decline since January.】

item.title: HDFC 银行部门寻求高达 3 亿美元的离岸贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的私营贷款机构 HDFC 银行有限公司的一个部门正计划借贷多达 3 亿美元，因为印度中央银行收紧了对国内贷款渠道的限制。【原文：A unit of HDFC Bank Ltd., India’s largest private sector lender, is planning to borrow as much as $300 million, according to people familiar with the matter, as tighter rules by the nation’s central bank restrict domestic avenues.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数将反弹，瑞安航空下调业绩展望
黄金能源集团为煤炭交易申请 6 亿美元私人贷款
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，由 Golden Energy and Resources Pte Ltd.牵头的一个财团已签署协议，从包括 Davidson Kempner Capital Management LP 在内的私人信贷基金获得 6 亿美元贷款，用于支付收购澳大利亚煤矿的费用。【原文：A consortium led by Golden Energy and Resources Pte Ltd. has signed a deal for a $600 million loan from private credit funds including Davidson Kempner Capital Management LP to pay for its acquisition of an Australian coal mine, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 全球基金囤积近万亿元中国银行债券
item.description: 外国投资者增持了中国银行发行的短期债券，创下了新的纪录，因为有吸引力的美元转换利率继续为此类债券带来丰厚的回报。【原文：Foreign investors ramped up holdings of short-term bonds issued by Chinese banks to a fresh record, as attractive rates for swapping dollars continue to juice the returns available on such debt.】

item.title: 投资者谨记 "股票也会下跌"，重拾套期保值投资理念
item.description: 随着投资者对美国总统大选、第二季度盈利、经济增长和利率等各种问题的担忧，套期保值又开始了。【原文：Hedging is back as investors fret over concerns about everything from the US presidential election to second-quarter earnings, economic growth and interest rates.】

item.title: 老龄化是一个远比拜登更大的市场问题
item.description:
保险、医疗保健和养老基金正在与政治体制作斗争，而这个世界的寿命和工作时间都在不断延长。【原文：

Insurance, health care and pension funds are struggling with political institutions in a world that’s living and working longer.

】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 英国股东派息在创下季度最高纪录后将放缓
item.description: 据一份报告称，本季度向股东派发创纪录股息的英国公司将在下半年放缓派息，因为矿业公司的业绩下滑。【原文：UK companies that returned record dividends to shareholders this quarter are set to slow payouts in the second half, as miners drive a downturn, according to a report.】

item.title: 拉马福萨签署法律，允许储蓄者使用退休基金
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）签署了一项法律，允许储蓄者提前支取部分退休金。【原文：South African President Cyril Ramaphosa signed a law that will give savers early access to part of their retirement funds.】

item.title: 中国下调短期利率，金属经历一周暴跌后涨跌互现
item.description: 在经历了近两年来最严重的单周暴跌之后，金属市场涨跌互现，中国的降息有助于防止金属进一步下跌。【原文：Metals were mixed following the worst weekly slump in almost two years, with a rate cut in China helping to prevent further declines.】

item.title: 数字禁令的不确定性导致科塔克马恒达股价下跌
item.description: 科塔克-马恒达银行有限公司（Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd.）股价下跌，此前该银行表示仍在努力解除监管部门对其通过在线平台拓展业务的禁令，并公布了因出售单位股权收益而提高的利润。【原文：Shares of Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. fell after the lender said it’s still working to lift a regulatory ban on expanding its business via online platforms, and reported profits that were boosted by gains from a unit stake sale.】

item.title: 香港法院判处操纵市场罪最长刑期
item.description: 香港一家法院以操纵市场罪判处两名被告六年零八个月监禁，据主审法官称，这是该金融中心对此类罪行判处的最长刑期。【原文：A Hong Kong court sentenced two defendants to six years and eight months of prison time for market manipulation, the longest ever handed out for such an offense in the financial hub, according to the presiding judge.】

item.title: 台湾赖清德冒着激怒中国的风险呼吁 "国家认同
item.description: 台湾总统赖清德敦促执政党更好地培养民众对这个民主管理的群岛的归属感，这番话有可能恶化他与中国的艰难关系。【原文：Taiwan President Lai Ching-te urged the ruling party to better develop the public’s sense of belonging to the democratically run archipelago, comments that risk worsening his difficult relationship with China.】

item.title: 伦敦旅游热点酒店获得 5.25 亿英镑巨额再融资
item.description: Cheyne Capital 提供了今年欧洲最大的高级房地产贷款之一，为伦敦一些最著名的旅游地标周围的伦敦酒店组合进行再融资。【原文：Cheyne Capital has provided one of the largest senior real estate loans written in Europe this year to refinance a portfolio of London hotels clustered around some of London’s best known tourist landmarks.】

item.title: 被遗忘的 "银行和建筑商助推兰斯道基金表现出色
item.description: 投资建筑公司和欧洲银行可能不会像人工智能那样让投资者兴奋，但这类旧经济股票却是 Lansdowne Partners 绩优基金的核心。【原文：Investing in construction firms and European banks might not excite investors as much as AI, but such old economy stocks are at the core of the top-performing fund at Lansdowne Partners.】

item.title: 中国数据安全股在 Crowdstrike 错误更新后反弹
item.description: CrowdStrike Holdings Inc.的软件更新失败可能会刺激对国内替代产品的需求，因此中国数据安全公司股价大涨。【原文：Shares of Chinese data security companies surged on speculation a botched software update by CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. may boost demand for domestic alternatives.】

item.title: 中国精炼铜出口增加一倍，创本地过剩纪录
item.description: 由于全球最大的金属买家需求疲软，促使冶炼厂转向海外市场，中国上个月的精炼铜出口量飙升至创纪录水平。【原文：China’s refined copper exports surged to a record last month as weak demand in the world’s biggest metals buyer prompted smelters to turn to overseas markets.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称将获利回吐，亚洲科技股跌势加剧
item.description: 在摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的策略师建议投资者从人工智能热潮中获利后，亚洲科技股有望出现自大流行病初期以来最严重的下挫。【原文：Asian technology stocks were on track for their worst selloff since the early days of the pandemic after Morgan Stanley strategists recommended investors book profits from the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 从减税到福利支持，印度预算值得期待
item.description: 在印度新联合政府执政后的首份预算案中，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪预计将坚持抑制财政赤字的计划，同时仍将减税和增加福利支出，以让其盟友满意。【原文：In India’s first budget under a new coalition government, Prime Minister Narendra Modi is expected to stick to a plan of curbing the fiscal deficit, while still cutting taxes and boosting welfare spending to keep his allies happy.】

item.title: 拜登不顾跛脚鸭身份，期待在海外展现实力
item.description: 乔-拜登总统退出了 2024 年的白宫竞选，但他的团队表示，在外交政策方面，他还没有大功告成。【原文：President Joe Biden is out of the 2024 race for the White House, but his team is signaling he’s not nearly done yet when it comes to foreign policy.】

item.title: 印度预算案公布前投资者情绪缓和
对冲基金十多年来最大幅度削减日元空头押注
item.description: 在日本当局疑似采取双重市场干预措施以支撑日元汇率之后，对冲基金以惊人的方式减少了对日元的押注。【原文：Hedge funds pared bets against the yen in spectacular fashion after a suspected double-whammy market intervention from Japanese authorities to bolster the currency.】

item.title: South32 在氧化铝和镍减记 8.18 亿美元后暴跌
item.description: South32 Ltd. 周一股价大幅下跌，因为这家澳大利亚矿商报告了 8.18 亿美元的减值费用。【原文：South32 Ltd. shares fell sharply on Monday after the Australian miner reported $818 million of impairment charges.】
